text: Bilberry is any of several species of shrubs in the genus Vaccinium, bearing edible, nearly black berries. Bilberry may also refer to: * Bilberry, Cornwall, UK * Bilberry Hill, Worcestershire, UK * Bilberry goat, breed of feral goat * Amelanchier canadensis, common names include bilberry and Canadian serviceberry ==See also== * Blueberry (disambiguation) * Blåbärssoppa, Scandinavian bilberry soup * Bilberry soup (disambiguation)
title: Bilberry (disambiguation)
